text: The 1936 Volta a Catalunya was the 18th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 13 June to 21 June 1936. The race started and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Mariano Cañardo. == Route and stages == {| class="wikitable" |+List of stages |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Course ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- !
